resources.string: This page contains a list of artists. Create a Java class called artist. Create a custom arrayadapter class to display the list of artist objects in a ListView. Setup an onclick listener for each button that will nagivate the user to the details page when the button is clicked

This page contains a list of albums. Create a Java class called album. Create a custom arrayadapter class to display the list of album objects in a ListView. Setup an onclick listener for each button that will nagivate the user to play music page when the button is clicked
This page is for playing music. Create onclick listeners for the play and pause button. Use the media player class to play and pause an album inside the onclick listeners.
